data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pall-Gergely, Barna, Asami, Takahiro (2016): A new species of Gudeodiscus Pall-Gergely, 2013 from China, with extraordinary conchological and anatomical features (Gastropoda, Pulmonata, Plectopylidae). ZooKeys 564: 1-19, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.564.6560, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.564.6560
